attributes.action: Interview Refereeing decisions pre and post games
attributes.additional_details: Players and managers get scrutinised for their actions on and off the field and have to do interviews explaining their thoughts and decisions, before and after matches. The sport is now getting ruined because referees can get away with ludicrous decisions and don’t have the face up to it themselves. So by doing interviews the same way as players and managers, it gives an insight to why they made such choices and if they’re legitimate reasons, stopping the sport being ruined
attributes.background: Football is one of the biggest sports in the world and is now being ruined by awful refereeing decisions. So by getting referees interviewed before and after games, questioning their decisions will bring clarity and whether the individuals are good enough to referee our games.

rejection.details: The standards to which referees are held, and how their performance is measured, are matters for the Premier League, the Referees' Association, the FA and individual referees, not the UK Government or Parliament.
